name.str: Follow the directions on the pictographic sign

description: I found a weird pictographic sign that seemed to point towards someone willing to trade.

dialogue.describe: I found a weird pictographic sign that seemed to point towards someone willing to trade.
dialogue.offer: This is a sign with a series of simple line-art pictograms showing what appears to be a basic trade transaction.  A pair of hands offers a piece of some kind of junk, and another pair of hands offers a small pouch in return.
